price: 29. »Mas si queréis a Al-lah, a Su Mensajero y la Última Morada (del paraíso), (sabed que) Al-lah ha preparado para quienes hagan el bien de entre vosotras una gran recompensa».
arabic: وَإِن كُنتُنَّ تُرِدۡنَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَٱلدَّارَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَعَدَّ لِلۡمُحۡسِنَٰتِ مِنكُنَّ أَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-in kuntunna turid'na al-laha warasūlahu wal-dāra al-ākhirata fa-inna al-laha aʿadda lil'muḥ'sināti minkunna ajran ʿaẓīman
